name: WHO Length for Age (Boys, 0-24m, Percentiles)
description: World Health Organization length-for-age standards for boys aged 0-24 months. Displays P3, P15, P50, P85, P97.

name: CDC Weight for Age (Girls, 2-20y, Z-Scores)
description: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention weight-for-age standards for girls aged 2-20 years. Displays Z-scores -3 to +3.

name: WHO BMI for Age (Boys, 5-19y, Percentiles)
description: World Health Organization BMI-for-age standards for boys aged 5-19 years. Displays P3, P15, P50, P85, P97 and supports Z-score calculation via LMS.
